-- Initial Setup

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.databases WHERE name = 'CovidOnDemand')
    BEGIN
        CREATE DATABASE [CovidOnDemand]
    END
GO


USE [CovidOnDemand]
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'ParquetFF') 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFF] WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
);
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat') 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2   )
);
GO

IF (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys.symmetric_keys WHERE name LIKE '%DatabaseMasterKey%') = 0
BEGIN
    CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'CovidData2020'
END
GO

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.database_credentials WHERE name = 'SASToken')
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [SASToken]
    WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
    SECRET = '?sv=2019-10-10&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupx&se=2021-05-27T23:15:30Z&st=2020-05-27T15:15:30Z&spr=https,http&sig=6xpmsWHwTWdm4CrZL9DkH%2BSfIHsd%2BSQQMLBjV2xdgiY%3D'
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'CovidData') 
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [CovidData] WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://covidanalysisstorage.blob.core.windows.net/covidanalysisfilesystem/covid/sql',
    CREDENTIAL = SASToken    
);
GO

IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM sys.database_principals WHERE name = 'SQLAdmin')
BEGIN
    CREATE LOGIN SQLAdmin WITH PASSWORD = 'SynapseDem0';

    CREATE USER SQLAdmin FROM LOGIN SQLAdmin;    

    ALTER SERVER ROLE sysadmin ADD MEMBER SQLAdmin;
    
END
